reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable and soft, with a fit that sits right above the waist on petite frames.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute sweater!
items.body: Super cute and comfy sweater. My daughter loved this sweater in a different color so we got her black too. She loves wearing it to school and says it keeps her warm all day long. A small fits her perfect and it washes great in the washing machine. Highly recommend this sweater. Read more
items.author: Kristina Keller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Jumppmile Waffle Knit Crop Sweater
items.body: This crop sweater was purchased for a gift. It is beautiful. The waffle knit fabric is soft and the perfect weight for Fall weather. The V neck is super nice. The sweater is definitely worth the price. High quality, Although crop, appropriate length. Highly Recommend Read more
items.author: D Irwin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect layering Sweater
items.body: Super Comfortable and very cute, gave it a 4 as the color was off from what the photo showed, so it didn't match what I was going for, but still love it! Read more
items.author: Stephanie August

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great top
items.body: Super cute! Fits great on my teenage daughter, color is great. She gets alot of compliments on this shirt Read more
items.author: Brandi Sontag

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but boxy
items.body: Cute but boxy and large for the medium that I ordered. Was just not flattering at all. It was well made though but just not right for me. Read more
items.author: Susan D.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Conflicted
items.body: I ordered the XS and the S in various sizes and colors. This top is definitely shorter than I anticipated - and I’m 5 ft tall. I’m wearing the S in the photos, the XS hits me at my belly button. (I wonder what size the models are wearing??) I absolutely loved the fabric, the style, and the colors but the one thing I couldn’t get past are the shoulders (technically slightly below shoulders). If you notice in my photos, the stitching around the shoulders are very angular/pointy. Best I can describe it is comparing it to a top/sweater that’s been on a hanger for awhile. I was hoping if I washed it, it would relax a bit but it hasn’t. It’s the area where the seams meet, it causes it to be pointy. I loved how it looks on other reviewers - I really wish it looked like that on me. I really tried to get over the shoulders but I couldn’t. Unfortunately they are all going back. Read more
items.author: Susanna Min

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, well made, love the color choices
items.body: I have several of these - I love the quality and fits well for me (ordered a large and is not tight or clingy). It is a little shorter than a lot of sweaters which is exactly what I wanted to not be too long over skirts. Is holding up well too with multiple wearing/cleaning. Good price point. Read more
items.author: SH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, light, cropped sweater!
items.body: I love this sweater! Being on the shorter side (5’3”) I often find the oversized sweater look to swallow me up. This cropped sweater is the perfect alternative! It looks great with jeans, a skirt, or even over a dress without being too large/long on shorter gals. I plan to buy multiple colors, it’s a new staple! Read more
items.author: Brooke

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: #Thick 2.0 Black, Blue, Dark Grey, Army Green, Black, Camel, Oatmeal, Earthy Grey, Sand Beige, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
